forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet hours before dawn in Downtown San Francisco, shadows dance cautiously beneath a firmament that offers only a hint of clarity. The cool, gentle caress of a west-southwest wind whispers through the city, bringing a breath of anticipation for the day ahead. As dawn unfolds, the forecast promises a sunlit canvas, with a high that approaches 66, yet serenely eases into the comfort of the afternoon at 64. While the haze of an overnight marine layer hangs delicately in places, it is the warmth of sunlight that will soon reveal the grand details of the city—the Golden Gate Bridge, resplendent in its stature against a backdrop now painted in vivid hues.

Given these conditions, a stroll along the waterfront beckons, as does a visit to one of the local coffee shops that dot the streets. Attire should balance comfort and style; a lightweight jacket will serve well against the morning chill but can be shed as the sun ascends, inviting a more confident garment choice beneath the soft rays. The day unfolds like a well-kept secret—a chance to explore quiet corners of the city, perhaps tracing the path of the Embarcadero or indulging in a sit among the boughs of a nearby park. With spirits enhanced by the sun's embrace, it is a day ripe for subtle adventures and quiet reflections, all set against the awning of a magnificent San Francisco sky.
